attributes.action: Abolish need for TV license for live streaming non BBC channels
attributes.additional_details: Change the law so a TV license is only required for services offered by the BBC.
attributes.background:
At present you require a TV license to live stream non BBC channels and Internet only media sites such as YouTube and Prime Video when they stream live broadcasts. 

As more people move away from traditional TV channels it no longer makes sense or is fair to require a license for these platforms

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621917
